ygData.subject: RE: Planes, here I come...
ygData.msgSnippet: grats mara.  first advice is as you said, get a big buffer before you go. planes and dragons have taken me from level 55ish down to level 50 and less than 2
ygData.messageBody:
grats mara. first advice is as you said, get a big buffer before you go.
planes and dragons have taken me from level 55ish down to level 50 and less
than 2 bubbs. for songs i usually play mystic shielding (very few mobs use
fire/cold based spells that i've noticed) and verses of victory (celerity
and/or chant of battle before level 50) on normal pulls. i always keep
pixie up to help the enchanters. there are a few mobs up there we can get
it to stick on, but don't use it unless asked. pixieing a mob that's messed
gets the enchanter who messed it killed fast. usually someone shouts Shada
mes such and such. we can mes Loathing Liches, Abhorrents, Revenants,
sometimes Banshees and a couple other things. don't bother on Golems or
Clerics. i'm assuming you are planning on going to hate instead of fear
when i say all this. good luck to you =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L34 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>
>
> Hello fellow bards. I have finally, finally advanced out of
> level 45 hell. Hurrah!
> Of course I have no sense and the very next morning I went
> on a Vox raid and she
> kindly took it from me. Twice. Ouch. Ah well, it would
> have been worth it but
> alas no horn =(. Still, the Seafury Cyclops eventually
> yielded the re-ding.
>
> By the way, I used the knowledge I gained here about good
> strategies for Nagafen and
> Vox to prepare my song list. Nagafen was last week, and yes
> he thought bard tasted
> really good too. Lost the drum lotto on that one *pout*.
>
> I have 46 to get through before I attempt the Planes - I want
> that margin! - but
> that will be soon I hope. I have read a few posts on the
> topic of Plane strategies,
> but am eager for more. Help me out please?
>
> Maravana Vireo of the Jus Divinum
> Level 46 bard of Mithaniel Marr
